Room.Name: Hobar's Second Hand Store
Room.LongDescription: You are in the shop of Hobar, eldest son of Granovetter the dwarf. All about you are pieces of farm equipment, armor, old furniture, strange pieces of scientific apparatus, and just plain junk. One wall seems to be ocvered with an assortment of weapons. Looks like Hobar will buy just about anything, but does he ever sell any of this stuff?
